Quality control metrics

Source: R/metrics-methods.R
metrics.Rd

Quality control metrics

metrics(object, ...)

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
metrics(object, interestingGroups)

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroups

character. Groups of interest that define the samples. If left unset, defaults to sampleName.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

data.frame.

See also

Other Data Functions: counts, tmm

Examples

metrics(bcb_small) %>% str()
#> 'data.frame':	6 obs. of  27 variables:
#>  $ sampleName                   : Factor w/ 6 levels "control_rep1",..: 1 2 3 4 5 6
#>  $ day                          : Factor w/ 2 levels "0","7": 1 1 1 2 2 2
#>  $ description                  : Factor w/ 6 levels "control_rep1",..: 1 2 3 4 5 6
#>  $ genomeBuild                  : Factor w/ 1 level "GRCm38_90": 1 1 1 1 1 1
#>  $ replicate                    : Factor w/ 3 levels "1","2","3": 1 2 3 1 2 3
#>  $ samRef                       : Factor w/ 1 level "/n/app/bcbio/dev/genomes/Mmusculus/GRCm38_90/seq/GRCm38_90.fa": 1 1 1 1 1 1
#>  $ strain                       : Factor w/ 1 level "Balb/c": 1 1 1 1 1 1
#>  $ tissue                       : Factor w/ 1 level "kidney": 1 1 1 1 1 1
#>  $ treatment                    : Factor w/ 2 levels "control","folic_acid": 1 1 1 2 2 2

#>  $ intronicRate                 : num  0.203 0.217 0.167 0.296 0.296 ...
